text.__SUMMARY__:
Inga macarenensis is a species of legume in the family Fabaceae.
It is found only in Colombia.
text.References: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Inga macarenensis". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T38250A10107892. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T38250A10107892.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
